H30U0qDzzy-MofcUVl8lIg.text: Just in case there is anyone sitting on the fence about trying Chipotle, I thought I'd write a review.  Chipotle is the best fresh/fast food in the country.  I could eat it every day.  Crappy fast food sticks with you.  Chipotle with fresh ingredients, is wholesome, great tasting food.

GpQyJ9GzphxNTVRmCS5niQ.text: The food was amazing as usual! I got the Chicken Bowl, the store was really busy tonight so there were a few mix ups, like they forgot the chicken! But at least I ate there so it was corrected. The store was clean and staff was polite!

khOjiUlLtRUHeCwb5yLVog.text: Needed a fast bite to eat as I had to hit the hay early and catch a 6 am flight to Chicago.  This place was near my hotel and I always hear people rave about it so I thought I would give it a shot.  You walk in and there's a counter with a variety of fixins, you can get taco's, burritos, chips, guacamole, and a burrito bowl which is like a burrito but the tortilla is on the side.  Idea is you pick from a variety of ingredients such as rice, beans, sour cream, meat, chicken, etc., etc. and they roll it up in a big honking burrito for you.   I got a burrito with rice, black beans, steak and also some chips and guacamole.  Started with the chips and guacamole.  Chips weren't stale but they were not fresh either, not crunchy.  Guacamole was pretty average.  The burrito was fairly tasty, I liked the abundance of rice and beans with just enough meat to give it some character.  I didn't particularly like the atmosphere of the place, it was dark and sported a certain euro-minimalism that highlighted the fact that the place was dirty.  Tables were greasy, floors were dirty, and drink fountain had spilled crap all over.  Chipotle isn't a bad idea but there was something about the place that turned me off.  My guess is that it's a typical chain where the people there are just doing their jobs, there's no sense of ownership.  If I want to enjoy a big honking burrito, I think I would rather go to a Super Mercado where they know how to make a real burrito, not just assemble one.  And where they are happy to have you as a customer.

rydz5j5eWV2wA64O_ry9hA.text: Good food, great value. Cleanliness gets an F. Every time we have been there (11:00 am) the restaurant is still dirty from the day before. Floor is disgusting. Seats/benches/tables have not always been cleaned. This comes back to bad management. If the front of the house is this nasty, what does the back of the house look like?

3mNF1UtwtA1KBFHGa8tnFQ.text: I really like its chicken bowl. I get mine with mild salsa, a little cheese, brown rice, and black beans. Always delicious!

UesILbi-0ovK11SIJElm6g.text: Ordering online at this location is terrible, over 4 orders that have been wrong and all $20- $50 order they are getting wrong too.  I called today and the lady (megan) did not even put me on hold started yelling to manager "these people are complaining about their order"   Nasty restaurant inside never clean.

QUf0hnjj_twJAoOGPPYf-w.text: I often compare it to qdoba. There are only a few shortcomings for Chipotle that you must note... NO QUESO which is a huge number, and also they have no shrimp/fish options.   The burrito bowl was absolutely delicious I must say, I got half steak and half balbacoa. The balbacoa was delicious. I get less rice more beans which provides a good amount of protein. Price is reasonable and food is good.

iuhF1hgFTy_JEPOCDNziVw.text: Stopped in with my wife last night. Service was not good,  it just seemed like we were a bother to the servers. Lobby area had dirty tables, with no one cleaning them. Food was good, we both love the burrito bowls and that salvaged the visit.

LvbX9pc2tHyIg_V3DlZ7og.text: I have mixed feelings about this location. Conveniently located to the airport, it's a great place to stop on the way or on the way home, but if you go at peak hours, the parking lot is a nightmare, and so is traffic. The staff is generally attentive and efficient, so the lines always move quickly. This is probably the biggest "plus" of this location.  The bathrooms definitely leave a lot to be desired. They are never clean, and often smell. It's not that difficult to keep a bathroom clean, so this needs to be improved.  Despite the bathroom situation, the staff is always pleasant and the food is always dependable and fresh.

XhPEadfX2g626gxnyw9tqA.text: I am gluten free and dairy free and I was able to eat their tacos. The mild salsa was still too spicy for me and I would love it if they had vegan cheese, but enjoyed the tacos and chips. I would return.

F6rQZofGmluNutxAZgjrbA.text: They always have great food. We come here a lot, and never regret it! Most of the time our order is to go though.

uRYYvTyGwJbwKvrMhsil8Q.text: Stood at the register waiting to pay for my online order for over 10 mins while two employees stood right by me, talking and leaning on the counter.

rUCuplHudzQgH0sfc9179A.text: Good execution on Chipotle recipes, poor customer service. Seemed like grumpy suburban teens; be prepared for sub-par response. The bathrooms reeked, smelling as though they hadn't been cleaned in days; the floors and many tables were strewn with trash, and the drink bar wasn't stocked, or restocked our entire lengthy stay.  Steve Ells, this is not your best example.

o2-qpIXjY6zKswj5MOrSwA.text: I hate writing this review because the first few months I went there the service was great! Needless to say the more I went the shittier the meals were prepared. My last 4 meals were lacking. I always asked for two extra tortillas which they did until last 4 meals. It started with them giving me two small tortillas then on 2nd and 3rd no tortillas whatsoever. My 4th and last meal I got my tortillas but completely fucked up my burrito bowl like they didn't give a shit. Don't know what happen. Wont be going there anymore.

ddpClNkBZmCdkGsSnvP1xA.text: I love this place but the service at this location is terrible!!!! I cant tell you how much I dread going to this location. The line is out the door and they have three employees working the line. Chatting constantly and restocking. Its crazy to stand there and watch while the manager is in slow motion cooking food instead of jumping in the line to help. They will just walk away from the line to restock or taste the food. Maybe they havent been to another location to see that the fast service sells just as much as the food does. Lastly, we tried to order one item off the app today  and the wait time for pick up was 1hour and 1/2 . !! Whoa. It was 238pm. ...really! When we called he said their line is long and thats when it will be done. .... please do something with this location !!! Prime spot to do more business than it does now.

RsW4aEkiXIDanOnJ0x5pmg.text: So disappointed with my food today. I ordered chicken soft tacos to go. The chicken was close to being burnt and had a crunch to it with a not so good taste. I had the same thing a few days ago and it was perfectly fine. Whoever cooked the chicken this time should probably work the register!!

-okt1i72Yv9cH7Vj3MjIHA.text: Just like every other Chipotle. Quality ingredients, pretty fast service. Convenient to the mall, airport and many businesses. Thumbs up as always.

y8SMUo-Kjw0Bd_WRRbD7Dg.text: This is right by the Robinson Town Center shopping mall and only 10 minutes from the Pittsburgh International Airport.  Chipotle packs a lot of calories in one meal so that made it the perfect 7 hour traveling time pre-flight meal! At noon it was packed with business men on their lunch break and hungry Pittsburgh folks.  This isn't what I would call authentic Mexican food but this is still REALLY GOOD.  You can get burritos, burrito bowls, hard or soft tacos, and a quesadilla (for vegetarians).  The BURRITO BOWL is my favorite thing to get because it's basically everything inside a burrito, without the tortilla! Cilantro lime rice, spicy marinated steak, black beans, cheese, lettuce, mild tomato salsa, sour cream, and guacamole (extra cost) is my suggestion! Sometimes you're just in the mood for a good fatty burrito.  Got Guac all over my face every time I tired to take a bite, but that's just how large the burrito was :)

-b5tpGN6nqyWN44A92Zyeg.text: I love Chipotle!  HOWEVER, this location is horrible.  I understand the location is really busy, however, they have too many staff behind the counter.  8 people behind the counter and a cashier that creates confusion.   No one cleaning the dining area.  This area was pretty disgusting;  trash on the floor, tables, chairs, and garbage cans overflowing.   This one particular day, I was there earlier, and observed a kid throwing food on the glass.  I had to leave before ordering, but returned about 4 hours later, and the food and trash was still on the glass and floor.   The sidewalk was pretty nasty with food and spills.  That's an easy fix.  The bucket of water from mopping could just be dumped out just to rinse off the walkway.   I travel all over the county, and have frequented Chipotle 3-4 times a week.  They are all busy, but they maintain a balance with the hygiene of the dinning area.   This location didn't meet the minimal of my experience of this chain.

1cYXzgAw67g3pj-7VTbu7Q.text: I love this place. The line is always out the door no matter what time of day you go. It has the same menu as the others and price are about the same. The foodis very fresh and I have never had a bad meal from here.

0Nt_8bS0QlVSk9sdDApJNw.text: My love for Chipotle can sometimes be confused with infatuation or lust. Maybe. I've always lived in a city where there was a Chipotle nearby and some wonder if I pick a specific location because of that. Again, maybe.  Every time I'm at this location, I just miss the rush. I turn around in line and see a swarm of people starting to gather. I truly think someone's watching out for me or maybe I just eat during nontraditional hours.  I'll be honest, I won't branch out and try something new. I always get a bag of chips with a steak burrito bowl with a tortilla on the side OR a steak burrito . I also get extra rice, a little bit of corn, sour cream, cheese, and lettuce. (Was it just me or did you envision going down the line?) And of course, I use (several) splashes of the Milder Jalapeno Tabasco sauce.  The service is quick and the food is always a delight. I've never been disappointed.

-e3h4pl4dI7y0Z_VH9TkWQ.text: Great service and food came out piping hot. Fairly standard menu but with a few unique additions. Went with several friends and nobody left hungry or disappointed

22DaPeEeK-_HR7tDRqOArA.text: Stopped by after picking up a friend at the airport who had not eaten in hours, no dinner due to long flight, and it was late.  We were eating our hand-crafted, cylinder of Mexican wonderfulness in a few minutes.  Chipotle is good tasting Mexican fast food, with natural and organic ingredients.  The Flour tortilla with cilantro lime rice, pinto bean and carnitas was very good.

bTAoQufhitqSsX6NAujlcw.text: Great Mexican food! Everything has a nice amount of spice to it!

ip7vV5qkdBt3LihhbJt6dg.text: Fresh delicious fast real food Loooove the sofritas!!!! And the peppers and onions Soft corn tortillas for a taco - not so much. They're meant to be cooked.  Too soggy

WWbHclT92Xwq6KxNC5rpnQ.text: Don't serve enough for what you pay for. Lettuce is brown. Getting really annoying. Hoping they can make improvements soon.

I_6kqWvB5zs1_6a2yJ3jUw.text: This is probably my favorite chipotle in the Pittsburgh area. I never feel like I'm being jipped. It seems like portion sizes are ever the same at chipotle. The scoops here always appear reasonable. It does get busy during lunch time and they could stand to focus on cleaning the eating area a little more when they're busier.

Dk7-REKdbAV50HBk6AhAaA.text: I usually love Chiplote, but this may not be their best location.  They were out of chicken for a while, the Queso was horrible but it was my first time having Chiplote Queso

GqiPJPOktS_wgxNZ1Voh7w.text: My family and I used to go here at least 2 time per week.  Not sure what has happened, but this place has gone down hill.  Everything in this place is filthy.  The trash cans are always over flowing, the tables are cake with old food, floor looks like a college party just came through, and the bathrooms....yuck!  And this is what you can see.  Just imagine what the back of the house looks like.  Needless to say, we will not be back

photos.caption: Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States. Filthy

eQk-uMioh4fMM9fDq-Isuw.text: Well that's a rather excellent place to get a great dinner . . Well, I guess kif you like Mexican food . ( I do ). But rather simple service as you go ahead and get your meal made in front of you . But I just had a great wrap made  ( Well rather huge ! ). But not precisely sure about EVERYTHING . Well might as well check it out yourself . ( GREAT PLACE FOR A VEGAN DIET AS WELL ! )

_Jdhhf3ut_n9UQycUqowYg.text: The food is always good. BUT both times I've been to this location it's been dirty. The floors and tables have food & trash all over. The counter where you watch them make your food is a huge mess!. So gross. The only reason I give it 2 stars is because the staff are friendly.

OIVcuslsUVNFjax9yg9crQ.text: Hello friends. Today i am Somber because I have to give a less than 5 star rating to one of my favorite restaurants, Chipotle Mexican Grill. Unbelievable. I was in town for the Steelers game (grandson's favorite team) and well you know how the kids love their Chipotle so Margie said why the heck not. I love a good Chipotle bowl every now and again. So, grandson, son in law  and I walk into this Chipotle. The smells are all there, the guac, the chicken, the bathroom, the heart disease. Looks like your standard Chipotle,.. It was a Sunday before the Big game so it was quite packed. The employees are sweating into the tortillas as they roll up burritos as fast as they cann. Everything seems perfectly normak right? NOPE. So Margie goes up to order.. i get my chicken burrito bowl, and this man gives me one tiny tiny scoop of white rice. What am i a rat in a skinner box?? Unbelievable. I am a Carbs gal so I typically ask for extra rice anyway but i'm REALLY gonna need extra rice for that. I (POLITLEY) ask for some more, and somehow he makes rhat scoop even tinier? Not sure if this was his way of telling Margie to watch her old figure or what, (like I said i love to eat Carbs) but seriously he was frugal with his rice. Everyone else is lovely, (except girl gives me WAY too much of the mild sayce, but you win some and you lose some. When you're this old you learn to pick your battles) until I finally get to the gal ringing me out. Incredibly rude and short with me. I had to tell her five times I wanted chips wirh my order.. you would think she is the 60 year old! Very attitude when I correct her too. So we finally completes transaction and she pushes my stuff out of the way and goes on to my grandson. NO TRAY OR ANYTHING! Very rude. We all gave bad days so I try to brush it off. Finally we are sitting down, about to munch on our meals, and my food tastes.... funny. Not sure. Never had a chipotle burrito bowl taste that way. It was Sad. I ask my grandson ajd he says "yeah mine tastes a little funny too". Also the rude lady tried to flirt with my Grandson rught after my rude encounter. Incredibly tasteless, honey, he has a girlfriend and his granny is right there! Thankfully I am not from the Pittsburgh area, as my local Chipotle in Wilkes Barre far surpasses this. At least Steelers won yesterday. Barely scraping by just like this Chipotle. Thank for Your time and God Bless everyone. Have a Merry Christmas.

HOuNGHaQoRoZPqPBgven4w.text: Servers seemed rushed and acted like you are taking too long. White rice, chips, meat. All extremely salty.

EctzWIdsl-hT84UlnMA-Tw.text: This Chipotle location is AWFUL. The food is good, but the workers are rude and take forever to fill orders. Their customer service is terrible, the servers seem miserable and act like filling your order is an inconvenience. If you're okay waiting 20+ mins on a non-busy day to get your order then eat hear. If not, you're probably better off going next door to get burgers.

P-xT5O8fMWDFTNpY0HxS2g.text: Love Mexican and have enjoyed Chipotle over the years. Prefer the burrito bowls but also like the tacos, both hard and soft shell. Very good guacamole. Sadly, the downside is the inconsistent food quality. Last visit, the mild salsa tasted as if it had three times the salt called for in the recipe. In past visits, there have been times when the meats are way over seasoned. It's as if the employees are throwing things together without paying much attention, which is also the impression I have of Chipotle's way of assembling my orders and customer "service." Other reviews on this location being a mess are spot on. I only take out as a result.

rYEI-rFWiQsi5ZuauVCfiw.text: I got food poisoning from this location.  Avoid this place if you dont want to have to take the day off from work because of severe diarrhea.

LxTo62v0Q68hUgJsq6fzCA.text: This chipotle is like other chipotles. Set up, assembly line, wait, etc.    This particular location is convenient as I can stop by after a flight on my way to the hotel or out of town. It's got the long lines of every chipotle in the country, but I occasionally manage to get in and out without a long wait. I will say the parking lot for this one is tricky at times. There are a ton of other places to eat right there, including Burgatory, which means it can be a beast trying to find a parking spot.   Staff is friendly and fast, location is pretty good, and I love Chipotle. Win all the way around.

W0VXNOnwtIM4AnTRkQePVw.text: Chipotle was just what I needed after a long week and a long drive. This place was busy during lunch and I think it was after 12:30pm. The prices on the menu were the same as other locations (as it should be). I ordered a steak burrito ($6.65) and a small soda ($1.60).  I can't say based on my one visit here, but it seems that they stuff the burrito to the max.    Good place to grab a burrito considering the places around.

photos.caption: Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States. Steak Burrito that&#39;s stuffed

K3WghgP9eySpkoeVvaW1Gw.text: Seems like they hired a completely new staff at this location on the past few weeks and the service and food quality has definitely declined. The last two times I visited they were much slower, held way more conversations between each other and the meat in my bowls was in huge chunks, not bite sized pieces. Very disappointing

SZCW5MQst76-GaoywAqk2Q.text: Very fast and efficient crew. Got my food order from online in under a minute. And it was correct  Very pleased

V2OQQh9UAw-JUSx8LUxiWA.text: I come here often...way too often...since I work out in Robinson and it's the only Chipotle in the area. (Major excuse - I am here way too often because I'm addicted). No matter when I try to come in whether it's 11, 12, 1 or 2..it's ALWAYS packed. The lines are always  wrapped around and almost out the door. The usual wait for me is a good 15-20 minutes in line during peak lunch hours - it is annoying, but you know what I ain't mad about it I still enjoy my meal at the end of the day.   This particular location is a real hit or miss in all senses. I've come in and despite the line, have had fantastic service. The assemblers up front are nice and really accommodating when you ask for a little extra love in your bowl or burrito. Generally all most Chipotle's give you a pretty good portion regardless. I'm in and out in the line and it's a breeze to grab my stuff and go or dine in.   Other times I've been in it's been a real struggle bus where my mild is way too watery and it just sops up at the bottom of my bowl...or even worse! LEAKS! Sometimes they have ' too many cooks in the kitchen' in the assembly line and causes a back up instead of speed. I've read reviews where trash isn't taken out or they run out of stuff at the drink/utensil bar - True.   Fact of the matter is, all franchises are not created equal and management is different everywhere. They have their good and bad days so this one still gets a three. I've had more good experiences here than I have had bad. And you know what...it's not going to stop me from coming back.

pQ3j-I-PIF4Z8vNduACk8Q.text: By far one of the best Mexican style restaurants around!   The food is always fresh and delicious.   The service is fast and the price isn't too bad.   Can't beat their homemade chips too..   Ordering online is convenient..   just love it.

o5rXykI09fqBlKR4PrP0TQ.text: Consistently good, fresh tasting food. Would give it a 5 star if they had the carnitas. Chicken is ok but horribly disappointed in the steak bowl tonite. It was awful. Mean was horribly tough, unable to chew! Couldn't believe it!  Guacamole delicious.  Always get the bowl, corn salsa so good.

a28mF_P2s8lkqc_0pKSY_w.text: Myself and my husband went to Chipolte today and was very surprised how dirty the place was. The table were not cleaned off for the customers, the prep table was littered with food and the metal bins which hold the food selections around the surrounding area was littered with food and the floor behind the counter was littered with food.  My husband had a burrito and the burrito was cold.  Always was a faithful customer but if this continues I have to consider other restaurants.

Q7IzdYQnjIl8zwUkwfWavA.text: This location is nice! I haven't seen a location designed like this before. The flavor of the food is great like other locations. The service was super fast! Even during a busy time! It was probably faster than if I ordered online actually! I'm giving 4 stars because the staff talked really fast. I'm glad I knew how things worked there. If I didn't, I probably would have had to keep asking them to repeat. Also, I ordered chips with my meal. When I got home and opened the bag, it looked like someone had already been eating them. There was only a handful in the bag! Ironically, on the website it says the chips serve 2 people. I would go back to this location, just inspect my food before I leave if I take it home.

zAmqzsRBUTutYAR4wp8zwg.text: We love chipotle but this one is the worst. The guacamole is so salty it will burn your mouth. I'm pregnant and craving guacamole, got my normal burrito bowl and it was inedible. Soooo salty I really couldn't taste anything else. I asked if I could have it remade with a different batch of gauc and the preteens working the counter said no. Ok, well screw me then.   The staff obviously doesn't care and they'll remake your food but only with half the portion size of the regular meal. It's a disappointing experience. Go somewhere else for $30 fast food or drive to a different location, you'll be better off.  As a suggestion: Panera, Five Guys, Firehouse, and Burgatory all flank this chipotle. You have options that will probably be a more valuable use of time and money.

blchc9c8ftgmjPJkFvm_AA.text: Usually for me all Chipotle locations taste pretty much the same. Well not this location, chicken was bland and over cooked. Cashier was more interested in her cell phone than ringing me up.

b3Xvv8iNqxbhEu6SvMjLWw.text: i'm usually not a complainer but this location was absolutely disgusting so i have too. from the second we walked in we realized how disgusting it was, not even busy either. the trash cans were full and disgusting, the tables were covered with trash, even the food area was gross. my steak was all fat, i couldn't even finish it because it was so disgusting. i ordered an apple juice and it was old and tasted fermented. the coworkers were absolutely awful as well. the food was good, except for the fat, and the man running the register wasn't too rude. they forgot our queso and chips, and was aggressive with our burritos. i'm sure a 2 year old could roll a better burrito. the women working were so rude to us when we gave them absolutely no reason too. don't work at a public place if you cant be nice to people.  this chipotle has officially lost me as a customer. terrible service.

photos.caption: Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States
Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States
Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States

nzY6oLfonNyv6KyWtVj7fw.text: Previously, used to come to this location often. Not anymore. There is food all over the floor, tables have left over food and garbage, they're clearly not wiped down. The ice machine is backed up. The napkins and silverware are never kept to par. While the food is still delicious; I lose my appetite over the way the floor and whole place is kept. When notified staff their response is "yeah, I know we've been busy." Never too busy to clean up a place, but guess that's not the case for this chipotle location. The soda is also flat.

photos.caption: Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States
Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States
Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States

E6k8WYpGpIjMRRsLXzT4RQ.text: This is a really nice location, the customer service here is excellent, the staff is always friendly and super helpful and the food is always fresh and delicious with huge portions and lots of toppings! Our food was ready and waiting at our pickup time and everything in our order was perfect. I'd definitely stop back at this location.

9PjWoNA4reXdqe9XcLO-bw.text: Used to be a huge Chipotle fan but the place has gone down hill big time. Went there with my family and this location was filthy. Not sure how the manager is able to keep their job. Every single table had bits of food and garbage on it. The floors were covered with food and all the garbage cans were overflowing. While our burritos weren't bad, the chips were completely stale and the guacamole had  a quarter of an avocado skin in it. This was my third and last attempt to eat here in the last 2 years and it just keep getting worse. Such a shame.

6m2htFkt1V4XGManSLctOw.text: Consistantly undersized burritos. All tortilla with half a spoon of rice half a spoon of beans. Must be a location specific technique they use here to cut costs. Don't worry though, you still pay full price.

Hb-qpzuwFqXy6MPCNfTyfg.text: Your food is awful Many many people have told me to try it out it's the best they have ever had and I finally gave in. I ordered my usual quesadilla with extra cheese! You forgot the extra cheese because there was not enough! I will  be simply happy staying where I am at moe's where they get great food and great service! Good day

-QcHsfjtdCjo9htGVlR0wg.text: Been going here years and probably the worst experience ever.  Service was rude and so rushed and UNattentive...stating how busy they were yet only 4 people were behind me in line. The girls working literally were slinging food and tossed my food around into the bag. I rarely complain but this was s joke. Making matters worse they ran out of lettuce. When she told me this at the end of my order I was deciding if I still wanted it and she just decided to seal it and say that's it. Unreal experience I will not be back.

Sko87iEvZlIowTnYNdBrAQ.text: I usually love chipotle and have had great experiences but this specific one is a mess. Said hello to the first guy making the food and he didn't even respond. Told him white rice and he gave me the smallest scoop in the world and I couldn't even taste the rice. Asked for 2 cups for water and their water spout wasn't even working. Almost every table was dirty and had to clean it myself. Chicken was also very cold. I'm not one to complain but their was way to many problems to not say something.

ZpOsiiAjOAWoyIlUGGMUTg.text: This is my NUMBER ONE go to restaurant. If you need persuasion to go to this restaurant try there food it will change you completely

3GioryxFQWJIKh4AiZI4nA.text: I am a fan of Chipotle.   This is a standard Chipotle.  I went during lunch so it was crowded and a little dirty (expected since not everybody cleans up their mess and the staff are focused on preparing food).  What I like is that I can get it my way.   I ordered  a bowl - Double Chicken, Pinto Beans, Lettuce, Grilled Vegetables, and Medium hot sauce.  The meal met my expectations and kept me full for the rest of the day.     Price - less than $10 Atmosphere - Standard Chipotle (crushed and a little dirty but not to the fault of the establishment) Parking - the parking is a little crowded because of competing businesses. Xtra - It is next door to my favorite candy store - Rocket Fizz - another reason to go to Chipotle for lunch and drop in to get some retro candy :)

UUeptozvNvpy2E975QOOQw.text: This location was soo dirty , portions were very small, chicken was cold, they were out of guacamole ???? Workers didn't seem to care at all, almost every table to sit at needed cleaned .

photos.caption: Photo of Chipotle Mexican Grill - Pittsburgh, PA, United States. Small portions , no Guacamole, dirty tables

hfdfL2Cm2nCH1bHEXffhng.text: This is truly the dirtiest ive ever seen a chipotle, not one table was cleaned off,  no pop, your choices were Root beer, Sprite and lemonade,  both cokes were out,  no dr pepper.  At least the Bathrooms were ok.  Food was good tho.   Im disappointed this visit.

QooA-AbwnNnHnw8oViAYLg.text: I am an out of towner from the DMV area and I have been to many chipotle fast food chains there as well as other places. I have experience some of the best chains and some of the worse chains. This one is surprisingly good! I arrived here around 11:15am 2/3/18. The place wasn't crowded and it was very clean. The guy who started my order was extremely pleasant and gave me a very decent amount of food :-) Some places can be very stingy with toppings. Overall my experience was positive and the next time I'm in Pittsburg most specifically the area this chain is in I will be back.

I3rk_gIBXuUwBJPelc9tHA.text: I love Chipotle, and I used to love this location. Used to have friendly staff and gave perfect to generous portions! I always loved going to this location. But now the staff is rude, barely make eye contact, speaks so quickly I cannot understand what they are saying (and it's not like I'm elderly and hard of hearing), and the portions they are doling out are a joke. A couple weeks ago, when the young man behind the counter started running out of rice, instead of asking if I wanted to wait for more, he just scraped the dried out minuscule amount of rice off the sides of the pan and passed it along. Today I hoped to get a better crew, nope, barely even looked up once, had to ask then to repeat what they said, and the smallest amount of every ingredient...usually I have trouble finishing a burrito bowl, today I finished still hungry. The woman behind me had the sense the ask for more rice, meat and cheese...I should have taken her lead. They need to retrain employees to engage their customers and not skimp out on portions.

seQweA812A6VgCSCrZnZMA.text: I love their food. It is relatively healthy and doesnt hurt me when I eat there. I'd call it clean eating. They've added queso to their menu and it's delicious.  The only complaint I have is... they are terrible about replenishing the ice and soda in their soda machine. Oh and coupons, where are they? I want some.

I don't think so because if you have supervisor is better to go away from this place maybe he's leaving his house like this in the transfer into this business all the dirty  supervisor please clean the place people that eat here if you're living like this it's up to you.!!!! 7CFzAuRhmwlEBUGA-N4X4A.text: Steak here is ALWAYS chewy it's gross. I always try to come back to give them another chance because i love chipotle but this one isn't even worth going too. Might as well go to the one further away from my house. Plus i went in and im all about fast service but literally throwing the food into the burrito as fast as you can doesn't count. Half of everything goes on the table and leaves you with half the portion. Also the worker had to pick what looked like green peppers out of my steak because it got mixed in the serving bucket ??
